definition: incomparable/none to compare with at that time
to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting

sentences.english: Write at the age of 30 make the emerging of ips prajna tendril.
sentences.chinese: 三十一歲時寫出了曠世之作《般若金珠蔓論》。

sentences.english: Being a very famous Confucianist, Huang Zongxi also had indepth understanding in medicine.
sentences.chinese: 黃宗羲乃曠世之名儒，對醫學也造詣頗高。

sentences.english: Under tight situation of a person and bewitching outstanding big fight is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 緊張的情勢之下一場人與妖的曠世大戰即將開始。

sentences.english: This's a masterpiece born of a tragic misunderstanding between two men.
sentences.chinese: 這幅曠世鉅作因兩位男子間的悲劇誤會而誕生。
